description.en: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the seventh Lunar Year. The seventh Lunar Year is dedicated to the Horse.
description.ar: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the seventh Lunar Year. The seventh Lunar Year is dedicated to the Horse.
description.br: Uma capa lindamente trabalhada e adornada com um símbolo que representa o sétimo Ano Lunar. O sétimo Ano Lunar é dedicado ao Cavalo.
description.cns: 一件做工精美的披风。披风的图案展示的是第七地支午，该年的生肖为马。
description.de: Trägt das Symbol zum Jahr des Pferdes aus dem chinesischen Tierkreiszeichen. Erhöht die Ausdauer um acht.
description.fi: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the seventh Lunar Year. The seventh Lunar Year is dedicated to the Horse.
description.fil: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the seventh Lunar Year. The seventh Lunar Year is dedicated to the Horse.
description.fr: Une cape de belle confection, décorée d'un symbole représentant la septième Année Lunaire, dédiée au Cheval.
description.id: Cloak yang dibuat dengan indah dihiasi dengan simbol yang mewakili Tahun Imlek ketujuh. Tahun Imlek ketujuh didedikasikan untuk Kuda.
description.it: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the seventh Lunar Year. The seventh Lunar Year is dedicated to the Horse.
description.jp: 7番目の月の年を表すシンボルで飾られた美しく細工されたマント。7番目の旧正月は馬に捧げられます。
description.kr: 음력 7 년을 상징하는 상징이 새겨진 아름답게 제작 된 망토입니다. 음력 7 년은 말에게 바쳐진다.
description.nl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the seventh Lunar Year. The seventh Lunar Year is dedicated to the Horse.
description.pl: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the seventh Lunar Year. The seventh Lunar Year is dedicated to the Horse.
description.ru: Красивый плащ с символом седьмого года китайского календаря - лошадью.
description.sp: Una capa bellamente elaborada adornada con un símbolo que representa el séptimo Año Lunar. El séptimo Año Lunar está dedicado al Caballo.
description.sw: A beautifully crafted cloak adorned with a symbol that represents the seventh Lunar Year. The seventh Lunar Year is dedicated to the Horse.
description.th: เสื้อคลุมที่ประดิษฐ์ขึ้นอย่างสวยงามประดับด้วยสัญลักษณ์ที่แสดงถึงปีจันทรคติที่เจ็ด ปีจันทรคติที่เจ็ดอุทิศให้กับม้า
description.tw: 象徵農曆生肖馬年的斗篷
description.vi: Một chiếc áo choàng được làm thủ công đẹp mắt được trang trí bằng biểu tượng tượng trưng cho Tết Nguyên đán thứ bảy. Mùng 7 Tết dành riêng cho Giáp Ngọ.
